mapper.select: select * from tb_cody inner join tb_cody_favorite on tb_cody.cody_idx = tb_cody_favorite.cody_idx where tb_cody_favorite.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_cody_favorite where cody_idx = #{cody_idx} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from tb_item as it inner join tb_cody as cd on cd.cody_idx=it.cody_idx where it.cody_idx = #{cody_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_cody_recommendation(user_id, cody_look, cody_style_tag) values(#{cody_season}, #{cody_look}, #{cody_style_tag})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_cody WHERE ( cody_look IN (SELECT cody_look FROM tb_cody_recommendation WHERE tb_cody_recommendation.user_id = #{user_id}) AND cody_style_tag IN (SELECT cody_style_tag FROM tb_cody_recommendation WHERE tb_cody_recommendation.user_id = #{user_id}) ) AND ( cody_season NOT LIKE #{cody_season} ) ORDER BY RAND()
select * from tb_cody inner join tb_style on tb_cody.cody_idx = tb_style.top1 where tb_style.style_idx = #{style_idx}
select * from tb_cody inner join tb_style on tb_cody.cody_idx = tb_style.top2 where tb_style.style_idx = #{style_idx}
select * from tb_cody inner join tb_style on tb_cody.cody_idx = tb_style.top3 where tb_style.style_idx = #{style_idx}
select * from tb_cody inner join tb_style on tb_cody.cody_idx = tb_style.top4 where tb_style.style_idx = #{style_idx}
SELECT * FROM tb_cody JOIN ( SELECT cody_idx FROM tb_cody_favorite GROUP BY cody_idx ORDER BY COUNT(cody_idx) DESC LIMIT 5 ) AS best_cody ON tb_cody.cody_idx =best_cody.cody_idx
